mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_member (user_id, user_pw, user_pw2, user_name, email, phone, join_date, post, address1, address2 , address_detail) VALUES( #{user_id}, #{user_pw},#{user_pw2}, #{user_name}, #{email}, #{phone}, sysdate, #{post}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{address_detail})
mapper.select:
SELECT LAST.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, TEMP.* FROM (select m.user_id, m.user_pw, m.user_name, m.post, m.email, m.address1, m.address2,m.address_detail, m.phone, o.total_price, od.order_quantity, o.order_date, o.order_id, o.order_state, i.product_img, p.product_name, p.product_price from t_member m join t_order o on m.user_id = o.user_id join t_order_detail od on o.order_id = od.order_id join t_product p on p.product_id = od.product_id join t_product_img i on i.product_id = p.product_id
where m.user_id = '${user_id}' ORDER BY order_date DESC ) TEMP )LAST WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3

select m.user_id, m.user_name,o.order_date, o.order_date + 7 AS writeday, o.order_id, o.order_state, od.product_id, p.product_name, i.product_img from t_member m join t_order o on m.user_id = o.user_id join t_order_detail od on od.order_id = o.order_id join t_product p on p.product_id = od.product_id join t_product_img i on p.product_id = i.product_id
where m.user_id = #{user_id} and o.order_date >= (SYSDATE-1)
